mapper.select: SELECT reservation.reservation_id AS reservation_id, reservation.seat_id AS seat_id, reservation.start_date AS start_date, reservation.end_date AS end_date, reservation.note AS note, pi.fname AS first_name, pi.mname AS middle_name, pi.lname AS last_name, client.client_sh_name AS client_sn FROM tbl_reservation AS reservation INNER JOIN tbl_user AS user ON reservation.emp_id = user.emp_id INNER JOIN tbl_personal_info as pi ON user.user_id = pi.user_id INNER JOIN tbl_clients_mst AS client ON reservation.client_id = client.client_id WHERE reservation.start_date = #{start_date} AND reservation.end_date = #{end_date}
